BlackMonkey

    LEVEL_02

    CHAKRA

    Command robots that build the future

    Enter the world of robotics by building and programming your own robots. Learn to make machines move, sense, and respond. From basic motors to complex behaviors, become a robot master.

    Chakra introduces students to the exciting world of robotics. Build and program robots that move, sense, and respond to their environment. From constructing robot chassis to programming autonomous behaviors, students develop mechanical and computational thinking skills through hands-on projects and competitions.

    Age Group

    8-11 years

    Duration

    8 weeks

    Category

    Robotics

    What You'll Learn

    Build custom robot chassis

    Motor control and movement

    Sensor integration (ultrasonic, IR)

    Block-based coding (Scratch/Blockly)

    Autonomous navigation challenges

    Robot competitions and showcase

    Learning Outcomes

    Master mechanical construction

    Learn programming logic

    Understand sensors and actuators

    Develop computational thinking

    Ready to Build the Future?

    Master robotics with Chakra. Build, program, and compete with your own robots. Transform from beginner to robot master.
